data.Question: Are appropriate relationships with interest groups, cybersecurity specialized forums and professional associations maintained?
Is a cybersecurity awareness program implemented within the organization? Has an awareness action been carried out in the last 6 months?
data.Commentaire: Quarterly awareness for all newcomers and every 2 years for people who have already followed the awareness

data.Question: Has the organization implemented cybersecurity governance through risk management within its organization?
data.Commentaire: Risk analysis performed, reviewed annually at minimum and which gives rise to a monitored risk treatment plan whose results are presented regularly

data.Question: Are cybersecurity risks shared at the executive level of the organization?
data.Commentaire: Management commitment in the security policy

data.Question: Has the organization implemented a Data Protection Officer (DPO)?
Is the organization ISO27001 certified? Or another IS Security certification? If yes, please provide the most recent certificate(s).
data.Commentaire: Certification to come, objective to obtain in Q1 2024

data.Question: Is there a Business Continuity Plan? Does the Business Continuity Plan include scenarios related to a cyberattack? Is the Business Continuity Plan regularly tested?
data.Commentaire: Existing BCP with DRP, annual BCP test

data.Question: Does the organization inventory its vulnerabilities based on trusted sources (CERT)? Is a vulnerability management program/process implemented?
data.Commentaire: Vulnerability management with subscriptions to national cybersecurity organizations

data.Question: Does the organization have protection technologies against email attacks? Does the organization have tools to ensure internet browsing security?
data.Commentaire:
Anti-spam filters and DMARC for email
No tool for internet browsing at present
